name: Anjali
wishText: I hope you always stay smiley, cute and smarty-pants too ;)
textInChatBox: Happiest birthday cutieee!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: Tbh that's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something...
outroText: Yaar ye thode busy weeks mei bss itna hee suprise plan ho paaya, would've loved to make a video
replayText: Click here, if you want to watch it again.
